content:
Thank you so much for the offer! I think I've got everything I need for now. You've been incredibly helpful in assisting me with finding a great bed for Max and providing recommendations for flea prevention medication for Luna.

If I have any more questions or need further assistance in the future, I won't hesitate to reach out. For now, I'm excited to get Max settled into his new bed and keep Luna protected from those pesky fleas!

Thanks again for your help and have a wonderful day!
